website_summaries.verdict: An affordable way to make ice cream without needing a bunch of ice and salt.
pros: Makes 1.5 quarts of ice cream in 25-40 minutes
Large ingredient opening makes it easy to add candy, cookies, fruit, etc
cons: You have to plan ahead and freeze the bowl before using this machine

customer_reviews.title: Fun easy way to enjoy fresh tasting ice cream. Just plan ahead.
customer_reviews.text: Works well but you do need to plan ahead. The main container needs to be placed in the freezer overnight and the ice cream mixture itself should be made in advance and put in the fridge also. Very easy to use and ice cream is ready in about 35 minutes. The container is somewhat small however,probably enough ice cream for about 5 people from one batch. The kids think it's fun and the ice cream tastes great and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: ray dawson

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered, doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: The appliance I received isn't the one I ordered. The on/off button is on the bottom front. Two attempts to make ice cream failed. Both times, the mixing paddle stopped after less than five minutes because the mixture froze on the side and bottom , up to half an inch. ( Directions say it may take 20 to 40 minutes). The mixture in the center was not frozen. Recipes from website tasted good, more like a thin milkshake. Cleanup is easy. BUT not as expected. I hope seller will accept the appliance back!
customer_reviews.author: GLORIA J ANGELINO

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: Very mediocre results my first few tries, and twice the blades just stopped moving and I had to intervene multiple times to get them working. Part of the problem is that the pieces don't fit together well, and nothing clicks into place, so the various components sort of detach. And if the ice cream has firmed up when that happens, it's a real pain to get everything back in place. Also, the capacity listed is maybe if you filled it to overflowing, but it's a very small canister. Maybe technically they're not lying, but practically it's BS.
customer_reviews.author: Albert C. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but I don't use after two uses
customer_reviews.text: This is a hard one to review. It works good and is small enough for counter. Doesn't make much, just a quarter at a time. Having to leave the heavy pot in middle of it in freezer for 2 days makes it not a spontaneous treat. It's basically just a stirrer machine. It doesn't make anything cold, just the piece in freezer does that. So honestly you could just put ice cream mixture in a bowl in freezer and stir it occasionally and end up with same thing. But this machine does stir and keep ice cream cold enough while doing it to make ice cream. I would not buy again, but it was easy to clean and works.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth S.

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!!!  Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this machine several times. All my ice creams or strawberry sorbets came out GREAT!!!! Perfect size for small family or to share when taking to a dinner with friends! P.S. Still loving it! SO easy to use and who doesn't like some homemade ice cream? I even really liked the chocolate ice cream recipe, besides the vanilla and strawberry sorbet. Made them all, all good!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Z.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy homemade ice cream!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Made a few batches no problems. You have to really freeze the tub overnight before using. Homemade ice cream is a lot softer in consistency so after making it if you want it as a harder base you will need to freeze the ice cream for a little bit and then it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: ... made 4 batches and they have all come out like a milkshake
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying the homemade ice cream but I have made 4 batches and they have all come out like a milkshake. The next day, it is soft ice cream and delicious but I have not had any frozen and ready to eat direct from the ice cream maker. Perhaps it's the recipes I'm using. I do put the container in the freezer overnight beforehand.. Not exactly what I expected but no rock salt and the end result is yummy. I just have to be prepared to wait.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It is super easy to use. I am able to create my own ice cream and control the amount of sugar I add as well as the other ingredients. Found a ton of recipes online. Key, make sure the base has been in the freezer at least over night and that the ingredients are premixed and pre-chilled.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Leto

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t freeze the cream
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream maker worked a few times but now it doesn’t freeze the ice cream. I keep the bowl in my freezer which is turned to the coldest setting (so cold stuff in my refrigerator below starts to freeze) but the ice cream doesn’t. I have tried this ice cream maker with 4 different highly rated recipes and the ice cream remained soup each time. I would. It recommend this ice cream maker. It’s a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Frank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It did not work as they stated it would at all. I would have liked to return it. Per the product instructions we were supposed to run it form 20-40 minutes. After 40 minutes, nothing but the liquid and fruit bits were in the bowl for making ice cream. Very defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Viraj T.

customer_reviews.title: ... of ice cream in our household and this is awesome for when we don't have ice on hand
customer_reviews.text: We make a lot of ice cream in our household and this is awesome for when we don't have ice on hand.... We use it all the time. Its not loud so we are able to just plug it in on the kitchen counter. Yumm!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I keep mine in the freezer so it's ready whenever I want to make ice cream. Due to this one part of the inside is dented. It has not been dropped or bumped to cause this dent. Otherwise the machine is okay.
customer_reviews.author: C. Birch

customer_reviews.title: The motor stops too early.
customer_reviews.text: It simply fails at making what it is designed to make: ice cream. I tried several recipes, varying the water/fat ratio but it never worked, so I returned it. The motor stops way before the ice cream is ready, so I get at best something with the consistency of slush ice.
customer_reviews.author: Filippo Cavalca

customer_reviews.title: Would like to see the container retain the cold a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Ice cream does not get very frozen in this. Would like to see the container retain the cold a bit better. It does work, you just need to leave it in the freezer for a long time and keep your ingredients VERY cold before trying to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Chilled soup
customer_reviews.text: We have followed the instructions to the "T" twice already and both times we end up with chilled soup and not icecream... oh well, just gonna buy it already made from the store I suppose!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy VanHoltz

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to donate to a charity raffle...... It was a hit of the event.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy Ice Cream
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream maker made me a believer in all natural ice cream. I have used the rock salt and double bowl method twice, but it is messy and takes about 3 hours to make ice cream. The Hamilton Beach Ice Cream maker took only 40 minutes to make the ice cream a stiff, yet creamy consistency. I will never use rock salt again! Be patient and wait a full 24 hours to chill the container. It allowed me to make 3 flavors of ice cream before the temperature increased.
customer_reviews.author: Karen from PA

customer_reviews.title: nice budget machine
customer_reviews.text: This maker is easy to use and makes delicious ice cream. However, as previous reviewers have stated, the ice cream sticks to the wall of the bowl. I've read reviews on other brands and see similar complaints, so I guess it's just part of making ice cream. Otherwise, I'm happy with this machine and my family has been enjoying delicious frozen treats!
customer_reviews.author: rjm131

customer_reviews.title: I dearly love this. I was able to make ice cream ...
customer_reviews.text: I dearly love this. I was able to make ice cream that I've been craving but can't find in the store. In 20 minutes, I had the best, creamiest, and most delicious ice cream. Beats any from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more money and get a better ice cream maker
customer_reviews.text: Does not make ice cream!! Makes a shake substance. This does not get cold enough to freeze ice cream no matter how long you freeze the bowl. We also pre froze our mix per another reviewers recommendation. Spend a little more money and get a better ice cream maker!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jeske

customer_reviews.title: So easy to make ice cream and sorbet with this machine
customer_reviews.text: So easy to make ice cream and sorbet with this machine. Now I can have homemade tasty treats without the normal difficulties that make me avoid such tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hazelton

customer_reviews.title: Sweet ice cream machine
customer_reviews.text: I brought 2 of these. They are great. You will have to perfect your own ice cream recipe. The heavy whipping cream makes it a bit too rich. Also the will break easy so handle with care. I don't like tha Hamiton Beach doesn't offer you a parts list because the paddles are going to break easy after a lot of use. Having said this they are a great little machines and I would get more after seeing how well they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: She loved it. She couldn't wait to open and begin ...
customer_reviews.text: This was for our 10 year old niece. She loved it. She couldn't wait to open and begin making ice cream. She actually looked up recipes for avocado ice cream for when she got home. Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mary LisaTrend

customer_reviews.title: my guess is that it's just too darn bad for us
customer_reviews.text: We've probably used this ice cream maker about six times. Tonight, when I went to make ice cream, the paddle wouldn't turn. Since we are six months out of warranty, my guess is that it's just too darn bad for us.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this ice-cream maker would work. Sadly very disappointed! All it does is make cold soup! I've tried many times with different recipes and no luck. To late to return it. Would not waste my money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey F.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with punctured freezer bowl, liquid leaking.
customer_reviews.text: Maker arrived with freezer bowl leaking liquid, due to puncture in bowl. Waste of time and money. Used several ingredients and a lot of time and $ on ice cream we couldn't make.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: I paid for a new item and I recieve an used item and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a new item and I recieve an used item and missing parts. I definitely returned.
customer_reviews.author: esmeralda ramos

customer_reviews.title: Fun and yummy at the same time
customer_reviews.text: I live my ice cream maker. It makes the ice cream so fast. I use the 1% milk with the low calorie sweetner and away I go. Also, if you follow the recipe, it's better than any of the store bought ice creams. I have to get me another tub for the freezer. That way I can be making a new batch, while I'm eating the freshly made one. Summer will be much sweeter and colder this year.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Autrey

customer_reviews.title: She said it is very easy to use and loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter in law for Christmas and she has been making ice cream regularly since. She said it is very easy to use and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: The parts are all plastic. Works but feel cheap. I expected more... But one gets what you pay for. :)
customer_reviews.author: Juan A.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I bought this ice cream maker but I have had no problem with it. It does exactly what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Vmac

customer_reviews.title: Great  ice cream maker.
customer_reviews.text: As long as you have room in your freezer for the tub you should be very happy. Ice cream mixes well and it's easy to add in goodies at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaky freezer bowl on original and replacement unit.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these ice cream makers, and the freezer bowl leaked fluid all over. I returned it and ordered a replacement, and same story, the shipping box was even wet. These are trash, try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If only it had kept working more than once!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this ice cream maker to my wife for Mother's Day and she was thrilled! We made homemade raspberry ice cream and it was absolutely delicious and we were looking forward to using this machine frequently. The next time I went to use it a few days later, the motor sounded just the same, but it would not turn the ice cream paddle no matter what. So much for a wonderful machine if it only works one time and then becomes worthless! I am grateful that Amazon is willing to accept this gift back!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Noyce

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This was a gift. It runs for over an hour and the ice cream never hardens. It's just a soupy mess.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Seems like the whole dorm room enjoys it
customer_reviews.text: Grandaughter took this to college with her. Seems like the whole dorm room enjoys it. So glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Can't Get the Ice Cream to Freeze
customer_reviews.text: my husband wasn't impressed with this when i ordered it, turns out, he was right. the canister won't freeze enough to actually turn the ice cream mixture into ice cream during the churning process. at best, this is functions as nothing more than a mixer.
customer_reviews.author: mdbc77

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but noisy
customer_reviews.text: I actually used this quite a bit this past summer. It makes wonderful sorbet and is easy to use and clean up. It is quite noisy though. For the price I can live with 20 minutes of noise which is reduced if you put it in another room with the door closed:)
customer_reviews.author: Yukon Gal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and works good, grandkids thought it is great.
customer_reviews.author: john haggerty

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described
customer_reviews.text: I have only made one batch of ice cream, actually I made coconut milk based ice cream. It turned out a little icy because I didn't use real cream but the machine worked great. I did everything as the directions said. One drawback is the loud motor but it is easily drowned out by the stereo or TV.
customer_reviews.author: DAVIDZ36

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give it zero stars. I had the bucket in the freezer for at least 3 weeks so it was well frozen. Started the machine and poured my ice cream mixture in waited 3 hours and still like water, cold water but not ice cream at all. Very disappointed in my purchase wish I had kept the box would send it back and get the Cuisinart brand like I should've in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: William McGee

customer_reviews.title: Really Thinking About Returning It
customer_reviews.text: I am not pleased with the product. I have used it twice, and neither time did the ice cream freeze or even thicken properly. The first time, I assumed that it was "user error". But when it did not work the 2nd time either, I knew that it was not me. I followed all the instructions, but the chilled mixutre never hardened, even after 40+ minutes. It eventually began softening, even though the ice cream maker was still churning. It was also a lot smaller than I was expecting. I guess the next time, I will read the reviews, before I order.
customer_reviews.author: B White Manghram

customer_reviews.title: No issues, great.
customer_reviews.text: My husband says this makes the best ice-cream he's ever had. I think it's so-so, but considering the price, it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: MarkieAnn

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is really easy to use, i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Others were not happy with the noise level but I do not find it objectionable. I am lactose intolerable and love ice cream. Now I can use lactose free milk , and using Lactase drops (from Amazon) for the cream and half and half, I now enjoy lactose free ice cream. Hurray!
customer_reviews.author: paddle foot

customer_reviews.title: Little confusing
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using a product like this. Though it comes with an instruction booklet, it's slightly confusing. My first batch didn't come out right. Stuck it in the freezer overnight and came out fine in the end. If you have trouble making out the instruction book, my only piece of advice is trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: krowen33

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Make SURE to keep your freezer at lowest setting while storing the container, or this product will not work. Even if the freezer is at 5 degrees and you store the container for 24 hours, it will churn for 30+ minutes and you will still get soft-serve goop that will not set properly. If you store it at the absolute lowest temperature, it will make decent ice cream in 25 minutes. As I said, at $23, you get what you pay for! I think when summer rolls around I will get an old-fashioned rock salt churning machine and get some exercise as I churn it the old way... and get better ice cream!
customer_reviews.author: LA GUY

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: this was a good product, not the best quality but it gets the job done. I see this product as good practice until i can decide weather i want to spend the money on a more expensive ice-cream maker.
customer_reviews.author: HappyBunny

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loud. You get what you pay for. I wish I had gotten an upgraded higher end machine.
customer_reviews.author: sprinky

customer_reviews.title: It's so nice not to have to use ice and rock salt
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice not to have to use ice and rock salt. It makes ice cream in half the time as the old kind. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Melba Mize

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT SIMPLE
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I've made ice cream about 6 times after having it for just a few weeks. Granted didn't eat all the ice cream. Very fun, simple to clean and easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Optimific

customer_reviews.title: Too loud and ice cream sticks to freezer bowl
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend this ice cream maker, its $30, for 20 bucks more you can get the one by Cuisinart which is better quality. Its WAY TOO LOUD and the ice cream sticks to freezer bowl so you rarely get enough ice cream out.
customer_reviews.author: Lisamarie Benito

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Ice Cream Maker
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a good decision. It arrived in a timely fashion and has worked just as I expected it to. It is a bit noisier than I would like, but the end product is so good, all else is forgiven !!
customer_reviews.author: marje katchmark

customer_reviews.title: Great ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for friends but they are enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Harris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size for home use. I am still learning how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Linzmeier

customer_reviews.title: Ice Cream Homemade!!
customer_reviews.text: WE love this product, makes wonderful dairy free ice cream and gelato, and sorbet. We don't need ice or anything else, just freeze the container, make your ingredients and churn away!! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Who Doesn't Love Homemade Ice Cream!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second ice cream maker. I like it just as much as the first one.
customer_reviews.author: ShellBell646

customer_reviews.title: more like a smoothie
customer_reviews.text: it never turned my ice cream into actual ice cream, more like a smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Jackeline H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: A great product. Works great and makes very good ice cream. Comparable to the Krups ice cream maker at three times the price!
customer_reviews.author: Snowbird

customer_reviews.title: Great for sorbet!
customer_reviews.text: I made a strawberry sorbet this afternoon in this ice cream maker and it turned out delicious! The unit itself is small and easy to store, and doesn't makes just the right amount of ice cream with not too much left over. So far I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alane Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great product but I do wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I do wish it was bigger. Get a larger one for a bigger family if you buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Emery

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my 12 year old granddaughter. She and her mom have made several servings thus far and they surpass anything we can buy in the store! Definitely a super treat.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Suta

customer_reviews.title: Very nice easy to assemble and lots of recipe ideas on Pinterest
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly just right size for one person! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Root

customer_reviews.title: Ice cream never freezes
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to a T - I had the container in the freezer for 3 days prior to using it, made the ice cream base according to directions and put it in the fridge overnight, then put it into the machine and let it run for over an hour. I tried it again a couple of days later with a different recipe and it still didn't freeze. I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: nicmcc

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Not the sturdiest product in the world, but very nice for the price! PRO - Doesn't take up much space CON - Doesn't make a ton of ice cream at one time (maybe that's good for my waistline, though) Very simple to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Won't scream for this ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this little ice cream maker and just adore it. I prefer using the package mixes, but home made works great too. Secret is to get everything COLD. Quick and easy with little clean up. I'm never going back to the old way!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa L. Goldade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this ice cream maker. Perfect size and so easy and quick to make delicious frozen desserts
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: I do however like the ice bucket it comes with because you don't ...
customer_reviews.text: I was not very impressed with the texture and consistency of the ice cream. I do however like the ice bucket it comes with because you don't actually need to use ice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was bigger, and a bit quieter.
customer_reviews.text: Love this, just wish it made a bigger batch! Works great, but a bit noisy
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed. Only used 5 or 6 times and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed. Only used 5 or 6 times and the motor stopped working completely. I am wary of Hamilton Beach products but I tried this one. Think I have learned my lesson. Will look into the Kitchen Aid product as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Rengel

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.... very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get the machine and looked forward to using it, but the gel would not completely freeze, rendering it useless. I tried several times to use it each time keeping it in the freezer longer than the previous time, in the last attempt I kept it in the freezer for 2 weeks, but that didn't work either. I also kept the mixture in the fridge for over 24 hrs still nothing. Very disappointed I wish I could return it but I'm outside the US it won't make sense costwise. I wouldn't recommend it to anyone to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great easy clean up. Only down fall is if you have grandbabies over doesn't make large amounts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She's happy, I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Does everything she expected this to do. She's happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nick C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but it's very compact fits in small cabinet space.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Makes decent frozen yogurt but ice cream never seems to harden up.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Turner

customer_reviews.title: Not great for a warm day
customer_reviews.text: We've used it once and it made ice milk. Not very happy with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Furbee

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Easy and Fun
customer_reviews.text: This machine offers a nice way to make home-made ice cream. It is simple to use, simple to clean, and fun to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: compact size
customer_reviews.text: Good for a bunch of college kids in an apartment. It is a tad noisy. Make sure you have the components cold.
customer_reviews.author: ellen j.

customer_reviews.title: Not usable for 24 hours after deciding you want ice cream.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this item. Does not make hard ice cream, soft ice cream only, too much time in freezer before use, and has to be standing up, hogging a lot of freezer space. Not easy or convenient to use. If I could I would rate it 1/2 of a star.
customer_reviews.author: james pinckard

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: On the fence about this. It usually churns it in 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: officegirl

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I had some of the best ice cream from this machine. And it is so easy to use. I cant wait to use it again
customer_reviews.author: ftimetogo2

customer_reviews.title: Returning Immediately.
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this item immediately. We painstakingly followed both the recipe and equipment instructions. The mixture did not thicken even after 40 minutes of "churning". I cannot recommend this item in any way. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MiraBella

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a holiday gift. The reciepient was very eager to use it. I was invited to an ice cream party for New Years eve and the ice cream was excellent. I would recommend this product to all my family and friends in the market for an ice cream maker
customer_reviews.author: jenny terry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Love the ice cream I'very made with it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Joseph Coutee, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The freezer bowl was in my -2 F freezer for 3 days prior to use. All mix was chilled. Ice cream never solidified in the freezer bowl. Had to put in freezer overnight. Too late for kids to have. Not happy, going back. Bottom of freezer bowl scratched prior to use. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Weddle

customer_reviews.title: Used maybe 5 times and the motor burnt out. ...
customer_reviews.text: Used maybe 5 times and the motor burnt out. Only days after my return cut off. Now I am out $50.00 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Will not freeze
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my mother and mother-in-law. Neither has worked. Response from the company was freezer not cold enough (-15), not measuring ingredients correctly(two lifelong cooks), and you're doing something wrong. Very,very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Coach Mac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wedding gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a wedding gift for a friend and she loved it. Its perfect for newly weds and makes just enough ice cream for a small party or just two. Its compact enough to fit into the frig and very easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job and produces an okay product. If you plan on making ice cream often, pay the extra $ and get a nicer product. The freezer container is convenient, but the motor is weak, and tends to start reversing the paddle well before the ice cream is ready for the freezer. Great for an occasional novelty treat. Not for regular usage.
customer_reviews.author: J. Phifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gelato
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried the Ice Cream Maker twice, but it works very well. I would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Oertel

customer_reviews.title: ... insulation in side & out its works a lot better
customer_reviews.text: Need some insulation in side & out its works a lot better now
customer_reviews.author: Erica or Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product does not work. We have followed the directions and it produces nice cold liquid stuff, but no "ice cream".
customer_reviews.author: Patiocat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to use. Simple instructions get you snacking in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great to use for small group
customer_reviews.text: The hamilton beach ice creme maker work wonderful for a small group of 4 ..The only drawback is the amount it makes and once a batch is made the time lapse before you can make another.
customer_reviews.author: Greg f

customer_reviews.title: if I had to pick one as superior, it would be the kitchen aide batch (we ...
customer_reviews.text: Might as well make by hand. I was substitute teaching for a foods class and ordered for a recipe. We made half of the ice cream in this and half was mixed in a kitchen aide and frozen. There was very little difference, if I had to pick one as superior, it would be the kitchen aide batch (we did not use the frozen bowl. ..just regular ). Save your money and kitchen space!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Otherwise expensive and often hard to find dairy-free treats are a snap.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I like to experiment with different types of frozen desserts but all the messing with ice and salt was a pain. This ice cream maker solved the problem and works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgit Larson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these, but a family member wanted one for himself after we used ours. Bought it as a birthday gift for him, and he was thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: 40 minutes to Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great delivery too. Will likely buy a more powerful model next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: It never froze the cream we had sweet cream but never have gotten it to freeze yet even following the directions exactly
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Nigh

customer_reviews.title: It works well when you properly freeze the freezer bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value, everything works as it should. However, if you do not put the freezer bowl in the freezer at the correct temperature, then it will not freeze the ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Stokes

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 68320 1-1/2-Quart Capacity Ice Cream Maker, White
product_meta.description: Hamilton beach. 1.5 QT, white, ice cream maker, gel canister fits easily into freezer, no rock salts needed, large ingredient opening, easy lock lid, outer bowls prevent condensation buildup on counter, enjoy ice cream frozen yogurt custard Sherbert or Gelato.
feature_bullets: The product is manufactured in China
The product is easy to use
